name: Extract Web Content
description: Extracts content from web pages including title, content, and links.

inputs.name: query
inputs.description: The URL or search query to extract content from.

inputs.name: num
inputs.description: Number of search results to return (default: 10)

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Timeout in seconds for the search (default: 30)

inputs.name: content
inputs.description: Include content from search results (always true for this capability)
